DOC.brief_summary: A Phase I open label study AS1411 advance solid tumour . Objectives include determine MTD DLT AS1411 , determine PK profile AS1411 obtain preliminary evidence clinical biological response AS1411 therapy .
DOC.criteria: Patients advance solid tumour refractory conventional/standard treatment Age > / 18 year ECOG performance status < / 2 ( Karnofsky > /60 % Life expectancy > / 8 week Adequate organ marrow function Radiotherapy chemotherapy 4 week study entry ( 6 week nitrosourea mitomycin C Lack recovery adverse event ( AEs ) cause agent administer study entry ; current use investigational agent ( ) Uncontrolled brain metastasis include need corticosteroid therapy Pregnancy Uncontrolled intercurrent illness Psychiatric illness/social situation could limit compliance
